dict.acceptation: 什么地方；任何地方；无论何处；〈口〉（用于否定句〕根本(不）；

sent.trans: 刚才我们学习的any,anybody,anything,跟anywhere都出现在否定句里。

sent.orig: The Write Anywhere feature lets you handwrite nearly anywhere on the screen.
sent.trans: “任意位置书写”功能几乎会让您在屏幕上的任意位置进行手写输入。

sent.orig: It could be anywhere -- AOL, Yahoo, outside of school, anywhere.
sent.trans: 可能在任何地方-美国在线，雅虎，学校门外，任何地方。

sent.orig: The Internet makes it possible for everyone to receive education anywhere and anytime anywhere and anytime.
sent.trans: 互联网使每个人在任何地方和任何时候接受教育成为可能。

sent.orig: It got so that Ming-feng was afraid to go anywhere for fear of hearing contemptuous remarks.
sent.trans: 到处她都听见这一类的嘲骂的语句。
